p: Although iron is considered vital for cellular health since it is actively involved in the transportation of oxygen, however, its levels above the normal range are considered dangerous since they can lead to the generation of radicals, which can largely contribute to cellular injury ( Emerit et al., 2004). The ferric reducing assay was aimed to assess the ability of bioactive compounds to reduce ferric ion (III) to ferrous ion (II) by simply donating electrons rather than hydrogens ( Gülçin, 2015).
